AD_LaezelOnSomeoneInterfering.synopsis: Laezel is pissed at another character who interrupts the fight
AD_LaezelOnSomeoneInterfering.how_to_trigger: Triggers during the Romance2 if Laezel or the Avatar she's fighting is attacked by another character.

AD_LaezelOnAvatarUsingItems.synopsis: Laezel remarks that using items is cheating in a duel like this. But she brushes it off in the end. We don't have reactivity in the romance scene to cover for the player cheating, so this should be very light and playful rather than blaming.Added because Laezel will be blocked from using items during the fight as we don't want her to deplete the player's resources.
AD_LaezelOnAvatarUsingItems.how_to_trigger: Plays the first time the player uses an item in the duel against Laezel.

AD_LaezelOnAvatarHalfHealth.synopsis: Just some chatter during the duel.
AD_LaezelOnAvatarHalfHealth.how_to_trigger: Triggers when the Avatar is dropped below half health during the midnight Romance2 fight

AD_LaezelImmobilized.synopsis: Just some chatter during the duel.
AD_LaezelImmobilized.how_to_trigger: Triggers when Laezel is immobilized during the Act2 romance fight.

AD_LaezelOnHalfHealth.synopsis: Just some chatter during the duel.
AD_LaezelOnHalfHealth.how_to_trigger: Triggers when Laezel is dropped below half health during the midnight Romance2 fight. Will trigger instead of the OnHit dialog if players take her down to below half with one hit.

AD_LaezelCombatEndsDueToSpellsButWillRes.synopsis: Just some chatter during the duel. Should be kept a bit more vague to cover for different causes.
AD_LaezelCombatEndsDueToSpellsButWillRes.how_to_trigger: Triggers when the fight against Laezel stops temporarily but will resume later. Could be things like player charming Laezel and taking control of her, or the player using Play Dead, or possibly other things too.

AD_LaezelFirstTurn.synopsis: Just some chatter during the duel.
AD_LaezelFirstTurn.how_to_trigger: Triggers on Laezel's first turn in the Romance2 midnight fight.

AD_LaezelOnBeingHit.synopsis: Just some chatter during the duel.
AD_LaezelOnBeingHit.how_to_trigger: Triggers when Laezel takes the first hit during the midnight fight in Romance2.

AD_LaezelOnSomeoneInterfering_0.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelOnSomeoneInterfering_0.text: Stand down, fool. This battle is not your concern.

AD_LaezelOnAvatarUsingItems_0.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelOnAvatarUsingItems_0.text: Chk. Trying to cheat? See what that gets you!
AD_LaezelOnAvatarUsingItems_0.context: NodeContext: Not vehement at all, calling out romance player in their love-scene battle

AD_LaezelOnAvatarHalfHealth_0.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelOnAvatarHalfHealth_0.context: NodeContext: Not vehement, Lae'zel calls this out if romance player drops to half health in their battle for dominance.

AD_LaezelImmobilized_0.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelImmobilized_0.context: NodeContext: Not vehement, Lae'zel calls this out if romance player immobilises her in their battle for dominance.

AD_LaezelOnHalfHealth_0.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelOnHalfHealth_0.text: Keep it coming. Give me all you've got!
AD_LaezelOnHalfHealth_0.context: NodeContext: Not vehement, Lae'zel calls this out if romance player brings her to half health in their battle for dominance.

AD_LaezelCombatEndsDueToSpellsButWillRes.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelCombatEndsDueToSpellsButWillRes.context: NodeContext: Not vehement, Lae'zel calls this out if romance player charms her or uses some other disrupting spell in their battle for dominance.

AD_LaezelFirstTurn_0.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelFirstTurn_0.context: NodeContext: Not vehement but slightly goading, Lae'zel calls this out if romance player begins the battle for dominance against her.

AD_LaezelOnBeingHit_0.speaker: Lae'zel
AD_LaezelOnBeingHit_0.context: NodeContext: Not vehement, Lae'zel calls this out if romance player lands a blow in their battle for dominance.
